title: Strategies of Alterity
description: An advanced production course which emphasizes how artists and filmmakers approach “otherness” and “difference” as it is constructed in various media practices. Course will examine a wide range of forms and genres such as ethnography, science fiction, crime narratives, documentary film, and animated shorts. Two production-course limitation. Prerequisites: VIS 174 and two from VIS 164, 165, 165A, 165B, 171, 172, 175, 176, 177, 178, 179. Open to media majors only.
